Sphere <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math> has radius <math alttext="r sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mstyle></math>, such that <math alttext="r sub 1 is greater than r sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>r</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mstyle></math>, and has a charge of <math alttext="positive uppercase Q" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mo>+</mo><mi>Q</mi></mstyle></math>.
